ModMetaData.name: Astoriel
ModMetaData.author: Roskii
ModMetaData.description:
Space Elves!!
They are slightly faster and have slightly less health. They also have 1000 year lifespans and are immune to most aging effects (though they do get gray hair at 900).
Features: -New Race -Npcs and new Faction
**Please Use Show Hats with Hair**
Discord: https://discord.gg/qBn5AHN If you enjoy my work, feel free to donate: Ko-fi.com/D1D38SDB
Special thanks: Everyone in the Callistan Discord for all the ideas/chatting/encouragement!! Erdelf for humanoid races Chjees for all the great ideas/help/support! Chicken Plucker who is awesome xD You're all awesome! Note: Please make sure you're using the correct version of Alien Framework (its up on Github)
